monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: 8 x 70% (560%) magical damage (wind) - Triggers Shock (Debuff) Damage on all enemies every hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Charged Anomaly
skills.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Chill, Shock or Weakness to a random enemy.

skills.name: Charged Healing
skills.description: This Monster's healing actions are affected by Charge stacks as if they were attacks.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Debuff Weakness
skills.description: Debuff effects increased by 50%

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Deep Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Electrify
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Flash Freeze
skills.description: Trigger an additional 100% damage hit when applying Chill (Debuff) with an attack.

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Initial Shock
skills.description: Apply Shock (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Shock
skills.description: Aura: Shock (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Punishment
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an allied Monster removes a Buff from an enemy with an attack, there is a 50% chance the attack deals an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Shock Charging
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party triggers Shock damage, it gets 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
